name: Hells Unleashed
desc:
You reanimate every corpse within range. They keep all their capabilities they had in life, and are under your direct control for the duration of the spell.

You also animate 1d6+2 skeletons and 1d6+2 zombies within the area of the spell for the duration of the spell.

While this spell lasts, creatures you have animated by this spell or other Necromancy spells can't be reduced below 1 hit point.
author: CrusaderDroid
